oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slide Collection - Grand Ole Opry House
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Located along Briley Parkway, the Opry House opened March 15, 1974. Home to the Grand Ole Opry, it was the focal point of the 369 acre Opryland amusement complex. Opryland themepark closed in 1997 to make way for Opry Mills Mall. 35 mm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Grand Ole Opry House; Opryland; Opry Mills Mall
Popular culture; Entertainment; Music; Architecture; Buildings
Nashville (Tenn.); Briley Parkway
